title: Peer Feedback-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Strengthening Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, statistics)
context.additional_context: Hybrid feedback environment combining anonymity and face-to-face interaction on a smartphone-based VR platform

learning_goals: Learners can improve mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy through peer feedback processes
Learners can revise problem-solving approaches by synthesizing peer input from three or more anonymous group feedback sessions
Learners can verbalize their cognitive processes using combined oral and written feedback in VR simulation environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
